short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to search for players in the Sorare game, completely free!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A completely free extension for the Sorare game. A solution that will allow you to easily find users who have the two players you want. Just write the players' names, teams and card types. Afterwards, you can send a trade request to the users you want from the list that appears. And it's completely free!
